column4: yo guys, i'm trying to change the security of a router, and i'm trying to access it to do so, but I am unable to find the router's IP adress, or the one I find simply isn't working [16:27] <thecpaptain> right now i'm operating in windows, as I am unable to access the LAN via Ubuntu
Default router IP is generally 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.0.1, if you go to your network settings on Windows you should get a gateway address, that's the router IP
run ipconfig /all in command prompt and pastebin the output please
